entries: {@i (Monk only)} While you are attuned to this armor, you may spend one minute contemplating the patterns etched on this weapon's surface and regain 1 expended ki point. Once you use this property, you cannot use it again until you finish a long rest.

items.name: Congalala Claw
entries: When you hit a creature with this weapon, it must make a DC 12 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save the creature has disadvantage on concentration checks for 1 minute. You can use this property three times, regaining all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

items.name: Congalala Fang
entries: {@i (Bowgun only) Load Up.} Your normal ammo capacity increases by 10 while you are attuned to this weapon.

items.name: Brute Bone
entries: Your weapon deals an extra {@damage 1d4} bludgeoning damage.

items.name: Vibrant Pelt
entries: {@i (Sorcerer & Wizard only)} While attuned to this weapon you can cast the {@spell chromatic orb} spell once a day, without the required the material components and without expending a spell slot.

items.name: Brute Bone
entries: Редкий материал для улучшения брони.

items.name: Territorial Dung
entries: Материал, заменяющий навоз при изготовлении {@item dung bomb|AGMH}. При использовании таким образом он превращается в территориальную навозную бомбу, которая {@condition blinded|PHB|blinds} наносится существу на 1 минуту при попадании.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The pukei-pukei makes two attacks: one with its tongue and one with its tail. It can replace any one of these with its water glob attack.

action.name: Tongue
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} попадание, досягаемость 5 футов, одна цель. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) урон от удара.

action.name: Water Glob
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 3d6}) cold damage and the target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw, or become {@condition poisoned} with {@disease waterblight|MHMM} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Spiral Water Jet {@recharge}
entries: The pukei-pukei flies 10 feet into the air and discharges a beam of high pressurized water from its tail that spirals out from below it out to a 45-foot radius. Each creature in that  area must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw, or take 27 ({@damage 6d8}) cold damage and be {@condition poisoned} with {@disease waterblight|MHMM} for 1 minute on a failed save, or half as much damage and is not {@condition poisoned} on a successful one.

legendary.name: Kick
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} попадание, досягаемость 5 футов, одна цель. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) урон от удара.

legendary.name: Water Jet - Arc (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The pukei-pukei discharges a beam of high pressurized water from its mouth or tail in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw, taking 21 ({@damage 6d6}) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.name: Water Jet - Line (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The pukei-pukei discharges a beam of high pressurized water from its mouth or tail in a 60-foot line that is 10 feet wide. Each creature in a line must make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw, taking 21 ({@damage 6d6}) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
Coral Pukei-Pukei retains most of its characteristics from {@creature Pukei-Pukei|MHMM}.

However, Coral Pukei-Pukei sports bright orange coloring on its face, feet, and front wing claws. These turn red when it becomes enraged. The rest of its body has a pinkish-red tint to it while its underbelly and tail tip are violet.

While the Pukei-Pukei utilizes poison, the Coral Pukei-Pukei uses water as its main element of attack. Coral Pukei-Pukei is able to store high concentrations of water in its tail by drinking the sponge-like plants that lie in the Coral Highlands. By doing this, it is then able to shoot out jets of high pressurized water beams at hunters. It is also capable of doing this from its mouth by eating various plants. In addition to this, it can also throw out globs of water balls at hunters from its mouth. Unlike Pukei-Pukei, Coral Pukei-Pukei is more aggressive with its attacks. It is also shown to be able to use its tail far more effectively than Pukei-Pukei when attacking hunters.

items.name: Coral Pukei-Pukei Cortex
entries: While wearing this armor, you can cast the {@spell create or destroy water} spell from it as an action once per day.

items.name: Coral Pukei-Pukei Lash
entries: {@i Item Prolonger+.} Whenever you use a consumable item that has a duration, its duration is increased by an additional 12 seconds.

items.name: Flood Sac
entries: While wearing this armor, you have a swimming speed equal to your walking speed and you can hold breath underwater for twice as long as normal.

items.name: Coral Pukei-Pukei Sac
entries: Пока вы носите эту броню, у вас есть устойчивость к урону холодом.

items.name: Coral Pukei-Pukei Fellwing
entries: You have resistance to cold damage and immunity to the {@condition waterblight|MHMM} condition while you wear this armor.

items.name: Coral Pukei-Pukei Cortex
entries: When you place this weapon into any liquid, it will absorb up to 1 vial of it. The weapon will hold the liquid for 24 hours, or until you use an action to cause the liquid to pour out from the hilt or tip of the weapon.

items.name: Coral Pukei-Pukei Shard
entries: {@i Partbreaker+1.} You deal an extra 1d6 damage when you critically hit with this weapon.

items.name: Coral Pukei-Pukei Lash
entries: Ваше оружие наносит дополнительные 1d6 повреждений холодом.

items.name: Flood Sac
entries: When you cast a spell that deals cold damage, add 1/2 of your proficiency bonus to that damage.

items.name: Coral Pukei-Pukei Sac
entries: {@i Critical Draw+.} Во время первого раунда боя ваши атаки оружием ближнего боя наносят критический удар при броске 15 или выше.

items.name: Coral Pukei-Pukei Fellwing
entries: While you are attuned to this weapon, you can use a bonus action to exhale a stream of water in a 30-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw, taking {@damage 4d6} cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Once used, this property cannot be used again until you finish a long rest.

items.name: Lg Monster Bone
entries: Very rare armor upgrade material.

trait.name: Blight Resistance
entries: The valstrax has advantage on saving throws against blight effects such as fireblight, {@condition waterblight|MHMM}, or the {@spell blight} spell.

trait.name: Dive Attack
entries: If the valstrax is flying and dives at least 120 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a melee weapon attack, the attack deals an extra 36 ({@damage 8d8}) necrotic damage to the target.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the valstrax fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: The Red Comet
entries: The valstrax doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it takes the {@action Dash} action.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The valstrax makes two bite attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) piercing damage.

action.name: Wing
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}24 ({@damage 4d8 + 6}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 20} Constitution saving throw or be afflicted with {@condition dragonblight|MHMM} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat its saving throw at the end of its turn, ending the dragonblight on a success.

action.name: Crimson Salvo
entries: The valstrax fires six draconic energy balls at a target within 60 feet of it. That target must make a {@dc 20} Dexterity saving throw, taking 27 ({@damage 6d8}) necrotic and be afflicted with {@condition dragonblight|MHMM} for 1 minute on a failed save or half as much damage and isn't afflicted with dragonblight on a successful one. If the creature was on the ground, the energy remains in a 15-foot squared area centered on a point where the target was standing when the attack was made. At the start of the valstrax next turn each creature in that area takes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) necrotic damage. A creature can make a {@dc 20} Constitution saving throw at the end of its turn, ending the dragonblight on a success.

action.name: Crimson Beam {@recharge 5}
entries: The valstrax ppositions its wings in front of it to release accumulated draconic energy in a 120-foot line that is 10-feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 20} Dexterity saving throw, taking 70 ({@damage 20d6}) necrotic damage and be afflicted with {@condition dragonblight|MHMM} for 1 minute on a failed save or half as much damage and isn't afflicted with dragonblight on a successful one. A creature can make a {@dc 20} Constitution saving throw at the end of its turn, ending the dragonblight on a success.

legendary.name: Detect
entries: The valstrax makes a Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) Check.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: The valstrax makes a wing attack.

legendary.name: Rocket Dash (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The valstrax moves up to half its fly speed in a straight line, during this move it can move through other creatures without provoking attacks of opportunity. Any creatures the valstrax moves through must succeed on a {@dc 20} Dexterity saving throw or take 24 ({@damage 4d8 + 6}) slashing damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) necrotic damage and are knocked {@condition prone} on a failed save. On a successful save, the target takes half damage and is not knocked prone.

legendary.name: Ground Zero Burst (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The valstrax releases draconic energy in a 15-foot radius around it. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 20} Dexterity saving throw, taking 31 ({@damage 7d8}) necrotic damage and be afflicted with {@condition dragonblight|MHMM} for 1 minute on a failed save or half as much damage and isn't afflicted with dragonblight on a successful one. A creature can make a {@dc 20} Constitution saving throw at the end of its turn, ending the dragonblight on a success.

Due to the rampant dragon energy, Crimson Glow Valstrax has permanent glowing red marks connecting from the chest to the wings, showing up on the sides and wing-arms. The wings have a different design than a normal {@creature Valstrax|MHMM}'s wings, looking more like exhaust vents, and are covered in glowing red color similar to a normal enraged Valstrax. When inhaling air, the wings will glow a bright red and start spewing out dragon energy. When angered significantly, the energy starts to burst out in the form of large energy spikes on its head, and the whole torso glows red in color, with large amounts of dragon flame coming out of the chest and sides.

items.name: Gleaming Shell
entries: {@i Resuscitate.} You have advantage on Dexterity saving throws if you are suffering from a condition.

items.name: Shimmering Scale
entries: {@i Survivor+.} When an ally, that you can see, is reduced to 0 hit points you can use your reaction to gain +2 AC, +2 damage, and +2 to attack rolls for 1 minute. Once used, this property can't be used again until the next dawn.

items.name: CG.Valstrax Claw
entries: While wearing this armor, difficult terrain doesn't cost you extra movement. In addition, magic can neither reduce your speed nor cause you to be {@condition paralyzed} or {@condition restrained}.

items.name: Rouge Spikewing
entries: While wearing this armor you can use an action to speak its command word. This causes a pair of metallic dragon wings to appear on your back for 1 hour or until you repeat the command word as an action. The wings give you a flying speed of 90 feet. When they disappear, you can't use them again for 1d12 hours.

items.name: Crimson Liquid
entries: {@i Blightproof.} Во время ношения этой брони вы невосприимчивы к заклинаниям ослепления, заклинаниям, подобным способностям, и условиям.

items.name: Valstrax Spineshell
entries: {@i Dragonheart.} When you fall below half of your maximum hit points you gain the {@condition dragonblight|MHMM} condition for 1 minute. While affected by dragonblight, you have resistance to cold, fire, lightning, and necrotic damage.

items.name: Ruby Dragon Mindstone
entries: {@i Defense Boost (Necrotic).} While wearing this armor, you gain a +1 bonus to your AC, and you are immune to necrotic damage.

items.name: Gleaming Shell
entries: {@i (spellcaster only)} This weapon has 7 runes. While holding it, you can use an action to expend 1 or more of its runes to cast the {@spell scorching ray} spell from it using your spell attack bonus, and it deals necrotic damage instead of fire. For 1 rune, you cast the 2nd-level version of the spell. You can increase the spell slot level by one for each additional rune you expend.

items.name: Shimmering Scale
entries: {@i Resentment.} До конца вашего хода вы получаете бонус +1 к броскам атаки и урона против любого существа, которое нанесло вам урон с конца вашего последнего хода.

items.name: CG.Valstrax Claw
entries: {@i Elderseal.} Существо, пораженное этим оружием, не может использовать действие, которое имеет перезарядку, до начала вашего следующего хода. Существо все еще может бросить бросок на перезарядку своей способности в конце своего хода.

items.name: Rouge Spikewing
entries: {@i Weakness Exploit+.} When you have advantage on an attack roll with this weapon and you hit the target, you can have your weapon deal its maximum damage if the lower of the two d20 rolls would also hit the target (all extra damage dice must still be rolled). You can use this property a number of times equal to your Strength or Dexterity modifier (your choice), regaining all expended uses when you finish a short or long rest.

items.name: Crimson Liquid
entries: Your weapon deals an extra {@damage 1d10} necrotic damage.

items.name: Valstrax Spineshell
entries: {@i (Ranged weapon only) Rapid Reload.} You can reload as a free action while you are attuned to this weapon. Additionally, when you make a ranged weapon attack roll and roll a 20 for the attack roll, you can make one additional attack as a free action.

items.name: Red Serpent Orb
entries: {@i (Spellcaster only)} While attuned to this weapon, you can cast the {@spell disintegrate} spell from it, using your spell save DC. Once you use this property, you can't use it again until you finish a long rest.

items.name: Elder Dragon Blood
entries: Материал для улучшения оружия любой раритетности.

items.name: Elder Dragon Bone
entries: Материал для улучшения брони любой редкости.

trait.name: Sensitive Ears
entries: If the qurupeco takes thunder damage or a thunder spell is used within 60 feet of it, it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or become {@condition stunned} until the start of its next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The qurupeco makes three attacks, one with its Flint and two with its Peck.

action.name: Peck
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Flint
entries: If the qurupeco jumps at least 5 feet towards a creature as part of its movement, it can then use this action to strike its flint-like wingtips together, creating a small explosion in that creatures space. That creature must make a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw, taking 11 ({@damage 2d10}) lightning damage on failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Call for Aid (1/day)
entries: The qurupeco calls out for assistance, roll a {@dice d6}; if 1 or 2, a {@creature Royal Ludroth|MHMM} appears; if 3 or 4, a {@creature Rathian|MHMM} appears; if 5, a {@creature Nargacuga|MHMM} appears; if 6, a {@creature Deviljho|MHMM} appears.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The qurupeco's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 14}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

entries: Unlike {@creature qurupeco|MHMM|the normal variety}, this subspecies is red and blue in color. The electric flints are unique to this subspecies. They also call upon aid from much stronger monsters.
The threat from this variant is increased due to the allies it can summon to its aid. It is not recommended to use this variant until the players are able survive a CR 11 deadly encounter.

items.name: Qurupeco Scale
entries: Пока вы носите эти доспехи, вы можете использовать свою реакцию или бонусное действие, чтобы получить сопротивление урону от огня до конца вашего следующего хода. После использования этого свойства вы не сможете использовать его снова, пока не закончите длительный отдых.

items.name: Qurupeco Feather
entries: Whenever you finish a long rest you may attempt a {@dc 15} Charisma ({@skill Performance}) check using an {@filter instrument|items|type=instrument} you are proficient with. On a success, you gain inspiration if you do not already have it.

items.name: Vivid Feather
entries: You have a +2 bonus to {@skill Performance} checks while you wear this armor.

items.name: Alluring Beak
entries: {@i Recovery Speed.} Каждый раз, когда вы бросаете бросок на восстановление хит-пойнтов, удваивайте количество восстанавливаемых хит-пойнтов.

items.name: Flintstone
entries: Your armor is decorated with bird carvings. It has 10 runes. While wearing it, you can use an action to expend 1 rune from the armor and cause it to create one of the following sounds out to a range of 60 feet: a finch's chirp, a raven's caw, a duck's quack, a chicken's cluck, a goose's honk, a loon's call, a turkey's gobble, a seagull's cry, an owl's hoot, or an eagle's shriek.
This armor regains 1d6 + 4 expended runes daily at dawn. If you expend the last rune, roll a d20. On a 1, the runes cannot recharge for a week

items.name: Qurupeco Scale
entries: You gain proficiency with the {@item horn|PHB} musical instruments. If you are already proficient, you double your proficiency bonus when using it.

items.name: Qurupeco Feather
entries: While holding this weapon, you can use an action to summon a {@creature jaggi|MHMM} to your aid for 1 hour. It will act on your turn in the initiative and will flee if you or your allies attempt to harm it. Once you use this property, you cannot use it again for one week.

items.name: Vivid Feather
entries: Пока вы настроены на это оружие, вы можете использовать его как фокус заклинания.

items.name: Alluring Beak
entries: When you hit a creature with this weapon it must make a {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target becomes {@condition charmed} by you until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, the target becomes immune to this effect for 24 hours.

items.name: Flintstone
entries: Когда вы произносите заклинание, наносящее урон огнем, вы получаете бонус +1 к броску атаки заклинания.

items.name: Screamer Sac
entries: A crafting material used to make {@item sonic bomb|AGMH}s.

items.name: Med Monsterbone
entries: Редкий материал для улучшения брони.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the dah'ren mohran fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The dah'ren mohran has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: The dah'ren mohran deals double damage to objects and structures.

trait.name: Siege Vulnerability
entries: Siege weapons ignore dah'ren mohran immunities and resistances.

trait.name: Sand Surfing
entries: The dah'ren mohran can swim through desert terrain as if it was water.

action.name: Body Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}34 ({@damage 4d12 + 8}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Horn
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} to hit, reach 30 ft., one target. {@h}30 ({@damage 4d10 + 8}) piercing damage.

action.name: Rock Toss
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}24 ({@damage 7d6}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Horn Drill {@recharge 5}
entries: The dah'ren mohran moves up to its swim speed while rotating at high speed. During this move it may swim through other creatures without provoking attacks of opportunity. Each creature the dah'ren mohran moves through must make a {@dc 23} Dexterity saving throw, taking 34 ({@damage 4d12 + 8}) bludgeoning damage and are knocked {@condition prone} on a failed save or half as much on a successful one and are not knocked {@condition prone}.

legendary.name: Summon Delex
entries: Two {@creature delex|MHMM} emerge from underground to assist the dah'ren mohran.

legendary.name: Rock Toss
entries: The dah'ren mohran makes a Rock Toss attack.

legendary.name: Shake Off (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The dah'ren mohran thrashes around in an attempt to throw any object or creature that is on its body. Each creature on the dah'ren mohran must make a {@dc 25} Strength or Dexterity saving throw (creature's choice), or be thrown up to 40 feet off the dah'ren mohran. If a thrown target strikes a solid surface upon landing, the target takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) bludgeoning damage for every 10 feet it was thrown.

{@creature Jhen Mohran|MHMM} is a giant Elder Dragon that swims within the sand. itfeeds very much like a baleen whale. It swallows large amounts of sand to filter in any type of nutrients found within the sands.

Jhen Mohran's main adaptation is its huge size. Jhen Mohran is up to 11161.9 cm, twenty percent of this length is its tusks. Its body is streamlined and equipped with immensely powerful limbs, which allows it to travel through the sand at great speeds. It uses the front limbs and tusks to push aside sand. Though Jhen Mohran feeds on the nutrients found within the sand, it will expel the unnecessary materials outside of its body with the help of multiple blowholes. The expelled sand alone can cause a change in flow to the quicksand in the Great Desert. Occasionally, seasonal winds can catch the expelled sands and blow the sands in the direction of settlements, causing massive sandstorms. Jhen Mohran has powerful lungs that helps it hold its breath for long periods of time. Some older Jhen Mohran can even use their lungs to fire a destructive beam of sand at foes. If sand wasn't covering Jhen Mohran than it would be a beautiful blue color. By spending long periods in the sand, the ore has formed from be polished by the sands.

Jhen Mohran is a relatively calm creature, but has been known to retaliate against Desert/Dragon Ships if attacked as they see them as potential rivals. It takes little notice of hunters climbing on its back, and will only occasionally try to fling them off.

items.name: Mohran Scale
entries: {@i Sand Surfing.} While wearing this armor you're able to swim through desert terrain as if it was water.

items.name: Mohran Carapace
entries: {@i Divine Blessing+4.} Когда вы получаете урон, к которому у вас нет иммунитета или сопротивления, бросьте d12 и уменьшите получаемый урон на число бросков. Вы можете использовать это свойство количество раз, равное вашему модификатору мудрости. Вы восстанавливаете все использованные свойства, когда завершаете длительный отдых.

items.name: Mohran Rockskin
entries: {@i Handicraft+3.} For 24 hours, you gain proficiency with three artisan tools of your choice each dawn.

items.name: Sturdy Fang
entries: Пока вы носите эту броню, вы невосприимчивы к урону от огня.

items.name: Mohran Brace
entries: {@i Rock Steady.} Когда вы носите эту броню, вас нельзя непроизвольно сбить с ног {@condition prone}, и вы игнорируете такие эффекты, как кушала даора и ветровой барьер Аматсу.

items.name: Earth Dragongem
entries: {@i Iron Wall+.} You have a +3 bonus to your armor class while you wear this armor.

items.name: Mohran Scale
entries: {@i Speed Sharpening.} You can spend 1 minute sharpening a bladed weapon. When you hit a creature for the first time after sharpening it, the weapon deals its maximum piercing or slashing damage to the target.

items.name: Mohran Carapace
entries: {@i FastCharge+.} When you roll for initiative, your greatsword, longsword, charge blade, or tonfas gains 2 charge, spirit, or phial charge.

items.name: Mohran Rockskin
entries: You gain a +3 bonus to your spell attack rolls and spell save DC while attuned to this weapon. This bonus increases to +4 when the spell you are casting deals lightning or thunder damage.

items.name: Sturdy Fang
entries: {@i Critical Eye+.} Дальность критического удара ваших атак оружием увеличивается на 2.

items.name: Mohran Brace
entries: {@i (Hammer only) Punish Draw+.} All creatures hit by your hammer's mighty weapon make their saving throw at disadvantage.

items.name: Earth Dragongem
entries: {@i Mind's Eye.} Your attacks with this weapon bypass the damage resistances of any creature.

items.name: Elder Dragon Blood
entries: Материал для улучшения оружия любой раритетности.

items.name: Elder Dragon Bone
entries: Материал для улучшения брони любой редкости.

items.name: Pelagicite Ore
entries: Материал для улучшения оружия любой раритетности.

items.name: Bathycite Ore
entries: Материал для улучшения брони любой редкости.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The hermitaur can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Scuttle
entries: As a bonus action, the daimyo hermitaur can moves up to its speed in a straight line.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hermitaur makes two claw attacks.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 3d10 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Water Beam
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}22 ({@damage 4d8 + 4}) cold damage. On a hit, the target must make a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw or become {@condition poisoned} with {@disease waterblight|MHMM}.

action.name: Crush {@recharge 5}
entries: If the hermitaur jumps at least 15 feet as part of its movement, it can then use this action to land on its feet in a space that contains one or more other creatures. Each of those creatures must succeed on a {@dc 18} Strength or Dexterity saving throw (target's choice) or be knocked {@condition prone} and take 22 ({@damage 4d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage. On a successful save, the creature takes only half the damage, isn't knocked {@condition prone}, and is pushed 5 feet out of the hermitaur's space into an unoccupied space of the creature's choice. If no unoccupied space is with in range, the creature instead falls {@condition prone} in the hermitaur's space.

reaction.name: Retreat
entries: After being hit by an attack, the daimyo hermitaur can take the {@action dodge} action until the start of its next turn by retreating into its shell and using its shield-like claws to protect its head.

Daimyo Hermitaur has a large, crab-like body. It is covered in a red and white carapace and wears the skull of a {@creature Monoblos|MHMM} as a protective shell. They have huge, thick claws capable of holding prey as well as shielding the giant crab from most any attacks. Daimyo Hermitaur's shell is also very tough, able to deflect the blows of most weapons. The one chink in the creature's armor is its soft hindquarters, where many of the creature's major organs are stored. To fix this problem, Daimyo Hermitaur will wear the skulls of dead wyverns on their backs. Acquiring the right size shell is a chore though, and occasionally Daimyo Hermitaur can be spotted with shells too large, or small for their bodies. Almost all of Daimyo Hermitaur's shells come from members of the larger species like Monoblos. Daimyo Hermitaur also possess surprisingly strong legs, able to move the creature with great speed if necessary. The legs assist the creature in digging holes and they are able to launch themselves many feet into the air, causing them to land vigorously on top of hunters who don't react fast enough.

Some unusual rare Daimyo Hermitaur have a dark reddish color on their claws, darker legs and more shiny eyes. Along with this their shells are unusually covered in moss or algae. They also have the ability to spit long streams of water. They use new attack techniques as their claws are much stronger than average, they use their claws in a shielded position much like a human boxing while walking at a target, these claws are reported to be so strong in this position that ranged projectiles fired from guns ricochet, along with this new smarter advancing technique they perform a very aggressive non stop side to side claw snapping attack behavior that out-speeds most attackers.

Despite their size, Daimyo Hermitaur are fairly calm, when undisturbed. However, Daimyo Hermitaur will turn aggressive if they feel threatened or attacked. Most of time, they can be seen foraging for food as they roam around their environment.

items.name: Hermitaur Shell
entries: {@i Guard.} Вас нельзя толкнуть или опрокинуть назад, пока вы носите эту броню.

items.name: Hermitaur Claw
entries: {@i Well Rested+.} Когда вы завершаете длительный отдых, вы получаете 10 временных хит-пойнтов на 24 часа, пока настроены на эту броню.

items.name: Decayed Crimson Horn
entries: Пока вы носите эту броню, у вас есть устойчивость к урону холодом.

items.name: Hermitaur Claw
entries: Ваше оружие наносит дополнительные 1d4 косых повреждений.

items.name: Decayed Crimson Horn
entries: {@i Crisis.} While suffering from an abnormal status effect, such as poisoned, burning, slowed, blinded, etc, all attacks and spells deal an extra {@damage 1d10} spell or weapon damage.

items.name: Crab Pearl
entries: A jewel formed inside the body over many years valued at 75 gp.

items.name: Monster Bone+
entries: Rare weapon upgrade material.

items.name: Black Pearl
entries: A pearl with a black glow valued at 250 gp.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the dalamadur fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: The dalamadur deals double damage to objects and structures.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dalamadur can use its frightful presence. It then makes two attacks. one with its bite and one with its tail. It can't make both attacks against the same target.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}29 ({@damage 4d10 + 7}) piercing damage, and the target must make a {@dc 19} Constitution saving throw, taking 14 ({@damage 4d6}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 25 ft., one target. {@h}25 ({@damage 4d8 + 7}) piercing damage.

action.name: Constrict
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. {@h}18 ({@damage 4d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 18}). Until this grapple ends, the creature is {@condition restrained}, and the dalamadur can't constrict another target.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each creature of the dalamadur's choice that is within 120 feet of the dalamadur and aware of it must succeed on a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dalamadur's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Rattle
entries: Using the hypnotic sounds from the rattle on its tail, the dalamadur chooses one humanoid it can see within 30 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or be magically {@condition charmed} for 1 day. The {@condition charmed} target obeys the dalamadur's spoken and telepathic commands. If the target suffers any harm from the dalamadur or another creature or receives a suicidal command from the dalamadur, the target can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a target's saving throw is successful, or if the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dalamadur's Fiendish Charm for the next 24 hours. A creature that is {@condition Deafened} is immune to this effect.

action.name: Fire Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dalamadur exhales fire in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw, taking 59 ({@damage 17d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.name: Squeeze
entries: The dalamadur makes a Constrict attack.

legendary.name: Rattle (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The dalamadur uses its Rattle.

legendary.name: Meteor (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The dalamadur opens its mouth and magically creates three swirling balls of blue fire, launching them into the sky, each of which can strike a target the dalamadur can see within 120 feet of it. A target must make a {@dc 21} Dexterity saving throw, taking 18 ({@damage 4d8}) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

The Dalamadur has a snake-like face, with bright red eyes, numerous fangs, and many hook-like spikes along its body which start out clustered around its head and neck, and becoming more spread out along its long body, with a small cluster near the tip of its tail, which is topped with a pair of red barbs that it can rattle in a manner similar to rattlesnakes. Its has a pair of large clawed forearms, but the only remnant of hind legs it has are small spurs, similar to anacondas. Its chest has glowing vents, which huff steam. Its face and tail will also glow red when in its Raged state.

Dalamadur are quite aggressive in nature, willing to destroy adventurers at all cost. Dalamadur can easily destroy whole mountains with their coils and cause pieces of rumble to fall from them. For unknown reasons, large numbers of Dalamadur are known to raise from underground during certain times of the year.

items.name: Dalamadur Fanblade
entries: {@i Guts+.} Когда вас снижают до 0 хит-поинтов, но не убивают прямо, вы можете упасть до 1 хит-поинта. После использования этого свойства вы не сможете использовать его снова, пока не закончите длительный отдых.

items.name: Dalamadur Steel
entries: While wearing this armor you have resistance to poison damage. You can also communicate with snakes and snake-like creatures as though you shared a language.

items.name: D.Vortex Bone
entries: While you are attuned to this armor, you can use an action to speak its command word to cast the {@spell polymorph} spell from it and turn into a {@creature giant constrictor snake} (MM p.324) that resembles the dalamadur. Once used, this property can't be used again until the next dawn.

items.name: Dalamadur Pectus
entries: You cannot be {@condition paralyzed} while you wear this armor.

items.name: Dalam Tail Scale
entries: {@i Iron Wall.} You have a +2 bonus to your armor class while you wear this armor.

items.name: Skyblade Gem
entries: You have resistance to cold and fire damage while you wear this armor.

items.name: Dalamadur Glaive
entries: {@i Siege.} This weapon deals double damage to objects and structures.

items.name: Dalamadur Steel
entries: {@i Blast Coat.} This material provides one of the following weapon properties depending on which weapon it is placed in:

items: {@i (Heavy Bowgun)} Your {@item cluster ammo (1)|AGMH|cluster ammo} deals an extra 2d6 fire damage.
{@i (Bow)} Your {@item blast coating|AGMH} deals an extra 1d6 fire damage.

items.name: D.Vortex Bone
entries: {@i Critical Eye.} Дальность критического удара ваших атак оружием увеличивается на 1.

items.name: Dalamadur Pectus
entries: {@i Elderseal.} Существо, пораженное этим оружием, не может использовать действие, которое имеет перезарядку, до начала вашего следующего хода. Существо все еще может бросить бросок на перезарядку своей способности в конце своего хода.

items.name: Dalamadur Talon
entries: {@i (Bladed Weapon only) Honed Blade.} This weapons damage die is increased by 1 size up to a maximum of a d10. A d6 becomes a d8, and a d8 becomes a d10.

items.name: Dalam Tail Scale
entries: {@i (Spellcaster only)} You know the {@spell melf's minute meteors|XGE} spell while attuned to this weapon. If you already know the spell, you cast it as if it was one level higher than the spell slot you use.

items.name: Dalam Tail Shell
entries: This weapon has 3 runes which are regained daily at dawn. Once per turn when you hit a creature with this weapon you can expend a rune to have the target make a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} of you for 1 minute. A creature may repeat its saving throw at the end of its turn, ending the effect on a successful save.

items.name: Dalamadur Fanblade
entries: At the start of your turn if a creature is {@condition grappled} or {@condition restrained} by you, that creature takes {@damage 1d6} bludgeoning damage.

items.name: Skyblade Gem
entries: This weapon has 3 runes which are regained daily at dawn. As an action you can expend a rune to have the target make a {@dc 17} Charisma saving throw or become {@condition charmed} by you as if you cast the {@spell charm person} spell.

items.name: Elder Dragon Blood
entries: Материал для улучшения оружия любой раритетности.

items.name: Elder Dragon Bone
entries: Материал для улучшения брони любой редкости.

trait.name: Tunnel
entries: The delex doesn't provoke an opportunity attack when it burrows out of an enemy's reach.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} попадание, радиус действия 5 футов, одна цель. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6}) колющего урона.

action.name: Sand Blast
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) bludgeoning damage.

They have, like the {@creature Cephalos|MHMM}, the ability to "swim" through sand and even expel small sand blasts from their mouth at attackers. Due to their nimbleness they are difficult to hit. Several appear in the fights with {@creature Jhen Mohran|MHMM} and {@creature Dah'ren Mohran|MHMM}, jumping onto the boat and attacking Hunters that get in their way. Delex hunt in small groups of six or seven individuals and likely prey upon small animals. They also scavenge off the remains left by larger desert-dwelling monsters.

items.name: Quality Fin
entries: While wearing this armor, your swimming speed is increased by 5 feet.

items.name: Sharpened Fang
entries: You reduce slashing damage you take by 2 while you wear this armor.

items.name: Quality Fin
entries: {@i Current Resist.} While holding this weapon you are unaffected by the waters current, natural or magical, unless you otherwise choose to be.

items.name: Sharpened Fang
entries: Your weapon deals an extra 1 slashing damage.

items.name: Monster Guts
entries: Monster innards. A prized delicacy worth 50 gp.

trait.name: Charge
entries: If the deviljho moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a target and then hits it with a Body Slam Attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 11 ({@damage 2d10}) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (2/Day)
entries: If the deviljho fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The deviljho makes two attacks, one with its body slam and one with its bite.

action.name: Body Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}30 ({@damage 4d10 + 8}) slashing damage. On a hit, the target must make a {@dc 22} Strength saving throw or be pushed back 10 ft. and knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}26 ({@damage 4d8 + 8}) piercing damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 2d12 + 8}) piercing damage.

action.name: Fire Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The deviljho unleashes a terrible breath in a 45 foot cone. Each Creature in that area must make a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw, taking 31 ({@damage 7d8}) fire damage plus 45 ({@damage 10d8}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.

action.name: Swallow
entries: The deviljho makes one bite attack against a Large or smaller creature that is {@condition prone}. If the attack hits, the target takes the bite's damage, the target is swallowed, and no longer {@condition prone}. While swallowed, the creature is {@condition blinded} and {@condition restrained}, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the deviljho, and it takes 56 ({@damage 16d6}) acid damage at the start of each of the deviljho's turns.

If the deviljho takes  40 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the deviljho must succeed on a {@dc 20} Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall {@condition prone} in a space within 10 feet of the deviljho. If the deviljho dies, a swallowed creature is no longer {@condition restrained} by it and can escape from the corpse by using 15 feet of movement, exiting {@condition prone}.

legendary.name: Detect
entries: The deviljho makes a Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) Check.

legendary.name: Tail Attack
entries: The deviljho makes a Tail attack.

legendary.name: Devour (Costs 2 actions)
entries: The deviljho uses its Swallow.

Deviljho is a bipedal Brute Wyvern characterized by its uniform forest green colouration and muscular upper body. Its thick hide is littered with short, jagged spines that reach a maximum height along the back and tail. Deviljho has a narrow snout with a large lower jaw, covered in multiple rows of teeth spreading outwards from the mouth. It has massive, powerful hind legs, but tiny, poorly developed forelegs that it rarely utilizes. Their eyes are small and simple, suggesting their vision is rather poor, but their other senses such as smell may compensate for this. Their tails are long and powerful, but their main feature of note is its breath attack. When provoked, Deviljho's back and shoulder muscles swell considerably. During this period, areas of its skin will take on a bright red colouration.

Deviljho is a nomadic monster, prone to wandering vast distances in search of prey. Its status as a super-predator allows it to overtake the territory of any monster that stands in its path. Because of the extreme amount of energy its body consumes, Deviljho is always in search of food sources. It is known to be cannibalistic, and is also prone to eating prey alive in order to waste as little time as possible in replenishing its energy.

items.name: Deviljho Hide
entries: {@i Carving Celebrity.} While you are attuned to this armor, you can carve a creature of CR 13 or lower 1 extra time.

items.name: Deviljho Scale
entries: {@i Speed Eating.} Пока вы настроены на эту броню, вы можете использовать любой расходный материал, такой как зелье или пища, в качестве бонусного действия; пока вы являетесь тем, кто его потребляет.

items.name: Deviljho Scalp
entries: While you wear this armor, you taste in all directions, and you have advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on taste.

items.name: Deviljho Saliva
entries: Whenever you make a saving throw against the {@condition frightened} condition, you do so with advantage.

items.name: Deviljho Tail
entries: While you wear this armor, you can use an action, to speak the armor's command word and attempt to swallow either a creature, or object, that is Medium or smaller. An unwilling creature must make a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw to escape the armor's grasp. Once swallowed, the creature or object is transported to a room that exists on a plane of existence found only within the armor. The room is a 10 foot by 10 foot cube, and can hold a single, living creature, and up to 1,000 pounds of objects. There are two windows on one of the walls that peer out, giving vision of the outside world.

For every hour that passes, a creature can attempt to escape by succeeding on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw. On a success, the creature is regurgitated, falling {@condition prone} in a space within 10 feet of you. Also, whenever you take 40 damage or more on a single turn, you must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw, or regurgitate any swallowed creature and all swallowed objects, which fall prone in a space within 10 feet of you. Speaking the armor's command word again spits out the creature or an object of your choice.

items.name: Deviljho Gem
entries: You have resistance to fire and necrotic damage while you wear this armor.

items.name: Deviljho Talon
entries: {@i Weakness Exploit+.} When you have advantage on an attack roll with this weapon and you hit the target, you can have your weapon deal its maximum damage if the lower of the two d20 rolls would also hit the target (all extra damage dice must still be rolled). You can use this property a number of times equal to your Strength or Dexterity modifier (your choice), regaining all expended uses when you finish a short or long rest.

items.name: Deviljho Tallfang
entries: {@i Partbreaker+2.} You deal an extra 1d8 damage when you critically hit with this weapon.

items.name: Deviljho Scalp
entries: When you cast a necromancy spell, you gain a +2 bonus to its spell attack roll or increase its spell save DC by 2.

items.name: Deviljho Saliva
entries: {@i (Sorcerer & Wizard only)} The weapon has 10 runes. You can use an action to expend 1 or more of its runes to cast one of the following spells from it, using your spell save DC: {@spell cause fear|XGE} (1 rune), {@spell ray of enfeeblement} (2 runes), {@spell ray of sickness} at 3rd level( 3 runes), {@spell contagion} (4 runes), or {@spell harm} (6 runes). The weapon regains 1d6 + 4 expended runes daily at dawn. If you expend the last rune it can't regain any runes for one week.

items.name: Deviljho Tail
entries: Your weapon deals an extra 1d4 fire damage and an extra 1d4 necrotic damage.

items.name: Deviljho Gem
entries: While you are attuned to this weapon, you can speak its command word to exhale a beam of hellfire in a 60-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw, taking {@damage 4d6} fire damage and {@damage 4d6} necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
После использования это свойство нельзя использовать снова, пока вы не закончите длительный отдых.

trait.name: Underground Charge
entries: If the diablos moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature while underground, it can then make a horn attack as a bonus action.

trait.name: Brute
entries: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the diablos hits with it (included in the attack).

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (2/Day)
entries: If the diablos fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The diablos makes two attacks, one with its horn and one with its tail attack.

action.name: Horn
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}29 ({@damage 4d10 + 7}) piercing damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}25 ({@damage 4d8 + 7}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Violent Roar {@recharge 5}
entries: The diablos roars loudly in a 15 foot radius around them. All creatures in this area must make a {@dc 22} Constitution saving throw, taking 45 ({@damage 10d8}) thunder damage and become {@condition Deafened} for 1 minute on a failed saving throw or half as much on a successful one.

legendary.name: Dig
entries: The diablos burrows underground and moves up to half its burrow speed.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: The diablos makes a Horn or Tail attack.

legendary.name: Quake (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The diablos strikes the ground with its maul like tail, triggering an earth tremor. All other creatures on the ground within 60 feet of the diablos must succeed on a {@dc 19} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

Diablos are large, bipedal wyverns with powerful armor plating covering much of their body. Their most noteworthy feature is a pair of massive, solid horns above their eyes. Diablos also possess a pair of tusk-like fangs and a large, spiny neck frill. Their tail ends with a heavy, studded club that can be used to ward off attackers. Diablos stand on a pair of stocky, wide-set legs and possess a broad upper body complete with thick, muscular wings.

Diablos have the ability to burrow into the earth and travel underground, employing this tactic to surprise unsuspecting targets or slip away from a dangerous encounter. In addition, they are capable of producing a powerful roar that will stun most aggressors. Using their powerful legs in tandem with their heavy upper body and head, Diablos can run at high speeds to charge attackers with their horns, using the powerful momentum to maximize the potential for damage.

Diablos are herbivores, known to feed on the plentiful cacti of the desert. Despite this however, they are wildly aggressive and will pursue anything which enters their territory. Diablos are known to use their horns as weapons against attackers, but will also use them in bouts against other Diablos in battles for territory or mating rights. Diablos typically avoid flight for the purpose of transportation, as a disproportionally high mass prevents them from effectively flying for long periods of time. Instead, Diablos will use their wings to free themselves when trapped in the sand.
Diablos are commonly found in dry, arid desert environments. The soft, loose earth allows for digging and the water-rich cacti provide them with both nutrition and hydration.

items.name: Diablos Carapace
entries: {@i Tremor-Proof.} You cannot be knocked {@condition prone} while you wear this armor.

items.name: Diablos Fang
entries: While you wear this armor, if an effect moves you against your will along the ground, you can use your reaction to reduce the distance you are moved by up to 10 feet.

items.name: Diablos Shell
entries: Пока вы носите эту броню, скорость передвижения в норах составляет 20 футов.

items.name: Diablos Ridge
entries: {@i Wind Resistance.} You have resistance to thunder damage and you suffer no ill effects from strong winds (DMG p.110) while you wear this armor.

items.name: Diablos Tailcase
entries: {@i (Shield required)} While holding a shield, you have resistance to damage from ranged weapon attacks. Whenever a ranged weapon attack is made against a target within 10 feet of you, you become the target instead.

items.name: Diablos Marrow
entries: You have immunity to fire damage, but you are vulnerable to cold damage while you wear this armor.

items.name: Blos Medulla
entries: {@i Alert.} You can't be surprised while you are conscious.

items.name: Twisted Horn
entries: You gain resistance to slashing & piercing damage from nonmagical attacks while you wear this armor.

items.name: Majestic Horn
entries: {@i Heroics.} While below 25% of your maximum hit points your weapon attacks deal 1d4 extra damage and you have resistance to all damage except psychic damage.

items.name: Diablos Carapace
entries: {@i KO.} When a creature must succeed on a saving throw or become {@condition stunned} by the effect of one of your weapon attacks, they make the save with disadvantage.

items.name: Diablos Fang
entries: Your weapon deals an extra 1d8 piercing damage.

items.name: Diablos Shell
entries: While attuned to this weapon, you can use an action to say its command and let out a violent roar. Each creature in a 15-foot radius around you must make a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw. On a fail the creature takes {@damage 5d6} thunder damage and is {@condition deafened} for 1 minute. On a successful save, the creature takes half damage and is not deafened. Once you use this property, you can't use it again until you finish a long rest.

items.name: Diablos Ridge
entries: {@i Earplugs.} While you are attuned to this weapon, you can use a bonus action to conjure two earplugs in the shape of your choice. While using these earplugs, you are considered {@condition deafened} and you have advantage on saving throws against thunder damage. You can dispel the ear plugs as a bonus action ending the deafened effect.

items.name: Diablos Tailcase
entries: {@i Quick Load.} You can reload as a free action while you are attuned to this weapon.

items.name: Diablos Marrow
entries: {@i Stamina Thief.} Once per turn when you hit a creature with this weapon, it must make a {@dc 10} Constitution saving throw or gain one level of {@condition exhaustion}. A creature cannot gain more than 2 levels of exhaustion from this weapon's property.

items.name: Blos Medulla
entries: {@i Charger.} When you use your action to {@action Dash}, you can use a bonus action to {@action shove} a creature.

items.name: Twisted Horn
entries: {@i Critical Draw+.} Во время первого раунда боя ваши атаки оружием ближнего боя наносят критический удар при броске 15 или выше.

items.name: Majestic Horn
entries: Your weapon deals an extra 1d10 piercing damage.

items.name: Diablos Stone
entries: Legendary armor or weapon upgrade material.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (2/Day)
entries: Если dire miralis проваливает бросок спасения, он может выбрать вместо него успех.

trait.name: Magma Armor
entries: When the dire miralis is below half of its maximum hp, its body cools and AC increases by +4.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: Dire miralis наносит двойной урон предметам и строениям.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dire miralis makes two attacks: two with its claws, or two with its magma glob attack.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}25 ({@damage 4d8 + 7}) slashing damage.

action.name: Magma Glob
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}The target and the space it is in, are covered in lava, taking 27 ({@damage 5d10}) fire damage. The space is covered in lava for 24 hours before cooling. Any creature that starts its turn or enters the space for the first time, takes 11 ({@damage 2d10}) fire damage. On a miss, an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the target is covered in lava. The lava ignites flammable objects in the area that aren't being  worn or carried.

action.name: Crush
entries: The dire miralis slams its body on the ground in a 40-foot square in front of it. Each creature in that areas must succeed on a {@dc 19} Strength or Dexterity saving throw (target's choice) or be knocked {@condition prone} and take 18 ({@damage 4d8}) bludgeoning damage + 18 ({@damage 4d8}) fire damage. On a successful save, the creature takes only half the damage, isn't knocked {@condition prone}, and is pushed 5 feet out of the dire miralis's space into an unoccupied space of the  creature's choice. If no unoccupied space is with in range, the creature instead falls {@condition prone} in the dire miralis's space.

action.name: Greater Fireball {@recharge 5}
entries: The dire miralis exhales a massive fireball within 150 feet of its location. Each creature in a 25-foot radius Sphere centered on that point must make a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw. A target takes 38 ({@damage 11d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Dire Miralis is a very large, semi-aquatic Elder Dragon. Its body structure is reminiscent of {@creature Fatalis|MHMM}, with relatively short limbs and a long tail and neck. Its body is filled with a magma-like substance which pools at the base of the tail, the chest, and at each shoulder. Each of these pools directs magma flow to certain parts of the body. On its back are a pair of wing-like appendages. Seemingly useless in terms of flight, these "wings" feature cannon-like chutes which can extrude globules of magma, both as a means of defense and as a way to jettison excess magma. Dire Miralis's head features a frill-like structure and an upturned snout.

Из-за горячих жидкостей внутри Dire Miralis от его тела исходит сильный жар, который кипятит любые источники воды вокруг него. Этот сильный жар может легко уничтожить всех живых существ в радиусе действия Dire Miralis.

Интересно, что долгое время после смерти Dire Miralis его сердце продолжает биться, даже если его удалить - как гласит легенда. Говорят, что Dire Miralis может регенерировать все свое тело с помощью одного только сердца, и что Dire Miralis даже бессмертен.

Dire Miralis крайне враждебно относится ко всему живому и может уничтожить целую экосистему просто от своего сильного жара. Дир Миралис фактически уничтожил Запятнанное море и убил все живое в этом районе, наполнив воду кровью, пока не был изгнан в древние времена. Этот монстр - один из тех, о которых многие охотники не доживают до наших дней.

items.name: Miralis Scale
entries: {@i Current Resist.} Пока вы носите эту броню, на вас не влияет течение воды, естественное или магическое, если только вы не решите иначе.

items.name: Miralis Fireback
entries: {@i Windproof.} Наложенные вами заклинания, такие как {@spell fog cloud}, больше не могут быть рассеяны ветром, магическим или иным, пока вы носите эту броню.

items.name: Gushing Magma
entries: {@i Earplugs.} Пока вы настроены на эту броню, вы можете использовать бонусное действие, чтобы наколдовать две затычки для ушей выбранной вами формы. Пока вы используете эти затычки, вы считаетесь {@condition deafened} и имеете преимущество при бросках спасбросков против урона от грома. Вы можете развеять затычки как бонусное действие, прекратив эффект оглушения.

items.name: Immortal Heart
entries: When you are below half of your maximum hit points, you can use your bonus action to increase your AC by 2 for 1 minute. Once you use this feature, you cannot use it again until you complete a short or long rest.

items.name: Miralis Hellwing
entries: Пока вы носите эту броню, у вас есть сопротивление к урону от огня.

items.name: Miralis Evil Eye
entries: {@i Rock Steady.} Когда вы носите эту броню, вас нельзя непроизвольно сбить с ног {@condition prone}, и вы игнорируете такие эффекты, как кушала даора и ветровой барьер Аматсу.

items.name: Miralis Scale
entries: Your weapon deals an extra 1d6 slashing damage.

items.name: Miralis Fireclaw
entries: Your weapon deals an extra 1d6 fire damage.

items.name: Immortal Heart
entries: Whenever you cast a spell of 1st-level or higher, lava erupts from the ground around you. any creature within 5 feet of you takes 5 points of fire damage. Also when you cast a spell that deals fire damage, it deals extra damage equal to 2 times the spells level as fire damage.

items.name: Miralis Smelter
entries: This weapon has 3 runes that it regains daily at dawn. When you hit a creature with this weapon, you can expend a rune to have it make a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target has disadvantage on all attack rolls against targets other than you until the end of your next turn.

items.name: Miralis Hellwing
entries: {@i (Spellcaster only)} This weapon has 7 runes. While holding it, you can use an action to expend 1 or more of its runes to cast the {@spell fireball} spell (save {@dc 15}) from it. For 1 rune, you cast the 3rd-level version of the spell. You can increase the spell slot level by one for each additional rune you expend.
This weapon regains 1d6 + 1 expended runes daily at dawn. If you expend the weapon's last rune, roll a d20. On a 1, the runes cannot recharge for a week.

items.name: Miralis Evil Eye
entries: {@i Elderseal.} Существо, пораженное этим оружием, не может использовать действие, которое имеет перезарядку, до начала вашего следующего хода. Существо все еще может бросить бросок на перезарядку своей способности в конце своего хода.

items.name: Dire Dragongem
entries: {@i Latent Power +1.} Когда вы впервые в бою снижаетесь до четверти от максимального количества хит-пойнтов или в начале вашего хода на 10-м раунде боя, в зависимости от того, что наступит раньше, вы получаете эффект заклинания {@spell haste} на 1 минуту. После использования вы должны завершить короткий или длинный отдых, прежде чем сможете использовать это свойство снова.

trait.name: Charge
entries: If the dodogama moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a bite attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 9 ({@dice 2d8}) damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dodogama makes two bite attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Molten Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 8} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) bludgeoning damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage

Dodogama has blue scales with orange stripes covering its body. It has a massive bottom jaw used for storing rocks in its mouth, which will turn orange when they become volatile. Dodogama is known to eat rocks for defense. When these rocks are combined with its saliva, they become explosive in nature, becoming a powerful projectile that it can spit at predators.

items.name: Dodogama Hide
entries: Пока вы носите эти доспехи, вы можете использовать свою реакцию или бонусное действие, чтобы получить сопротивление урону от огня до конца вашего следующего хода. Вы можете использовать это свойство дважды, восстанавливая его после длительного отдыха.

items.name: Dodogama Scale
entries: You have a +2 bonus to {@skill Animal Handling} checks while you wear this armor.

items.name: Dodogama Tail
entries: Whenever you make a saving throw against an attack or spell that deals fire damage, you do so with a +2 bonus.

items.name: Dodogama Talon
entries: {@i (Charge Blade & Gunlance only) Capacity Boost.} This material provides one of the following armor properties depending on which weapon it is placed in:

items: {@i (Charge Blade)} Your phial charge maximum is increased by 1.
{@i (Gunlance)} You can use your shell attack one extra time between rests.

items.name: Dodogama Hide
entries: While attuned to this weapon, you gain a +1 bonus to your spell attack rolls when casting fire spells.

items.name: Dodogama Jaw
entries: {@i (Sorcerer & Wizard only)} You know the {@spell fire bolt} cantrip while attuned to this weapon.

items.name: Dodogama Tail
entries: {@i (Sorcerer & Wizard only) Mini-Bombardier.} This weapon has 5 runes. While holding it, you can use an action to expend 1 or more of its runes to cast one of the following Spells from it, using your spell save DC: {@spell burning hands} (1 rune) {@spell scorching ray} (2 runes), {@spell aganazzar's scorcher|XGE} (2 runes), or {@spell flaming sphere} (2 runes). This weapon regains 1d4 + 1 expended runes daily at dawn. If you expend the last rune it cannot regain any runes for one week.

items.name: Dodogama Talon
entries: {@i (Gunlance only) Artillery+.} Пока вы настроены на это оружие, ваш виверновый огонь теперь может быть использован дважды за долгий отдых, и вы можете добавить ваш модификатор силы к урону ваших атак снарядами.

items.name: Monster Bone+
entries: Rare weapon upgrade material.

items.name: Nourishing Extract
entries: A material that replaces the catalyst for crafting {@item demondrug|AGMH} or {@item armorskin|AGMH} potions. It can also be used in place of {@item mega nutrients|AGMH} when crafting {@item max potion|AGMH}s or {@item ancient potion|AGMH}s.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 0} попадание, радиус действия 5 футов, одна цель. {@h}1 колющее повреждение.
A dung beetle rolls dung around all day long. Need some dung? Then look no further! Just give it a kick. What you do with it is none of my business!

trait.name: High Jump
entries: The duramboros's high jump is up to 20 feet, without a running start. In addition, the duramboros does not incur attacks of opportunity while jumping.

trait.name: Jump Attack
entries: If the duramboros jumps 20 feet straight up and makes at tail attack against a target within range. On a Hit, each creature within 5 feet of the target must make a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw or take the same damage as the target on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The duramboros makes two attacks: one with its horn and one with its tail. It can't make both attacks against the same target.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} попадание, радиус действия 10 футов, одна цель. {@h}26 ({@damage 3d12 + 7}) урон от удара.

action.name: Horn
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}23 ({@damage 3d10 + 7}) piercing damage.

Duramboros is a bulky, heavyset, bovine monster with stocky, muscular legs and a thick upper body. It features a very thick outer hide that is riddled with heavy folds, with a row of armored plates running along its back and tail. Duramboros' most distinctive features include its massive tail club, twin brow horns, and a pair of energy-rich dorsal humps. Duramboros' slow lifestyle often results in a layer of moss and algae growing upon its hide, most noticeably along the back.

Duramboros is a herbivore, subsisting primarily on fallen tree trunks. Using its ram-like pair of horns, as well its hammer-like tail club, it is known to push or knock down weak or dead trees in order to comfortably feed on them. Though generally docile, Duramboros has a capacity for aggression if provoked. It is known to use its tail club, horns, and overall mass to attack foes. One of its most unique tendencies is to twirl in place, using its tail club as a counter-balance to build up momentum, allowing it to hurl itself at an attacker and crush them with its body.
Due to its diet, Duramboros is most commonly encountered in highly forested areas.

items.name: Hard Mossplate
entries: While you are attuned to this armor, you can use your reaction to grant yourself advantage on any {@skill Acrobatics} check. Once used, you can't use it again until you finish a short or long rest.

items.name: Duramboros Hump
entries: While you are wearing this armor, you can use your reaction or bonus action to gain resistance to piercing damage until the end of your next turn. You can use this property twice, regaining all uses when you finish a long rest.

items.name: Duramboros Horn
entries: While you are wearing this armor, you can use your reaction or bonus action to gain resistance to slashing damage until the end of your next turn. You can use this property twice, regaining all uses when you finish a long rest.

items.name: Duram Sacrum
entries: Пока вы носите эту броню, у вас есть устойчивость к урону холодом.

items.name: Duram Carapace
entries: {@i Partbreaker.} You deal an extra 1d4 damage when you critically hit with this weapon.

items.name: Hard Mossplate
entries: {@i FastCharge.} When you roll for initiative, your greatsword, longsword, charge blade, or tonfas gains 1 charge, spirit, or phial charge.

items.name: Duram Tailcase
entries: {@i (Hammer only) Blunt.} While you are attuned to this weapon, your save DC for your mighty weapon property is increased by 3.

items.name: Duramboros Horn
entries: {@i Shotplus.} Your normal ammo deals an extra 2 damage.

items.name: Duram Sacrum
entries: {@i (Ranged weapon only) Deadeye+.} Your weapon's normal attack range is doubled.

trait.name: Rampage
entries: When the odogaron reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, the odogaron can take a bonus action to move up to half its speed and make a claw attack.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The odogaron makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claw.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) necrotic damage and the target must make a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw or become afflicted with {@disease dragonblight|MHMM} for 1 minute.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) slashing damage. If the target is a creature other than an undead or a construct, it must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw or lose 5 ({@dice 1d10}) hit points at the start of each of its turns due to an bloody wound. Each time the odogaron hits the wounded target with this attack, the damage dealt by the wound increases by 5 ({@dice 1d10}). Any creature can take an action to stanch the wound with a successful {@dc 12} Wisdom (Medicine) check. The wound also closes if the target receives magical healing.

reaction.name: Uncanny Dodge
entries: The Odogaron halves the damage that it takes from an attack that hits it. The odogaron must be able to see the attacker.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The odogaron moves up to its speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

legendary.name: Spit
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d8}) bludgeoning damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) necrotic damage and the target must make a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw or become afflicted with {@disease dragonblight|MHMM} for 1 minute.

legendary.name: Scavenge (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The odogaron consumes the corpse of a Small creature, or part of a Medium or bigger creatures corpse that is within 5 feet of it, regaining 10 hit points. Additionally, at the start of its next turn, the odogaron has advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls it makes during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

The Ebony Odogaron sports scales and bone like protrusions which resemble muscle tissues that cover its entire body. These scales and protrusions have a dark blue and jet black coloration to them, hence its Ebony name. Its claws are serrated and have a more blood red coloration. Unlike the standard {@creature Odogaron|MHMM}, the Ebony Odogaron has glowing red eyes and its mouth emits a black smoke, not unlike {@creature Savage Deviljho|MHMM}, which has dragon element properties.

The Ebony Odogaron is an aggressive creature, willing to attack even its standard counterpart, and is always on the hunt for its next meal. It carries its latest kill in its mouth as a means of sustenance to improve its abilities.

items.name: Hard Ebony Odogaron Sinew
entries: {@i Tool Specialist.} Во время ношения этих доспехов ваш бонус к мастерству удваивается при любой проверке способностей, сделанной с помощью инструмента, которым вы владеете.

items.name: Ebony Odogaron Shard
entries: {@i Negate Bleeding.} You are immune to wounding effects, such as the {@creature Odogaron|MHMM}'s bloody wound or the {@creature bearded devil}'s infernal wound while you wear this armor.

items.name: Ebony Odogaron Hardclaw
entries: While you wear this armor you have advantage on Charisma ({@skill Intimidation}) and Dexterity ({@skill Acrobatics}) checks.

items.name: Ebony Odogaron Hardfang
entries: Пока вы носите эту броню, у вас есть сопротивление к некротическому урону.

items.name: Ebony Odogaron Gem
entries: When you make a melee attack against a creature while wearing this armor, you don't provoke opportunity attacks from that creature for the rest of the turn, whether you hit or not.

items.name: Hard Ebony Odogaron Sinew
entries: {@i Quick Sheath.} Пока вы настроены на это оружие, вы можете всегда носить его в ножнах как свободное действие, даже если вы уже достали оружие как часть вашего действия перемещения.

items.name: Ebony Odogaron Shard
entries: You gain a + 1 bonus to your spell attack rolls and spell save DC while attuned to this weapon. This bonus increases to +2 when the spell you are casting deals necrotic damage, such as the {@spell inflict wounds} or {@spell vampiric touch} spell.

items.name: Ebony Odogaron Hardclaw
entries: While attuned to this weapon, your eyes glow red, your mouth emits a black smoke, and your weapon deals an extra 1d6 necrotic damage.

items.name: Ebony Odogaron Lash
entries: {@i Critical Eye.} Дальность критического удара ваших атак оружием увеличивается на 1.

items.name: Ebony Odogaron Hardfang
entries: {@i Critical Status (dragonblight).} When you make a weapon attack with this weapon, and roll a 20 for the attack roll, the target is afflicted with {@condition dragonblight|MHMM} until the end of its next turn.

items.name: Ebony Odogaron Gem
entries: While attuned to this weapon, you can use a bonus action to move up to half your movement speed towards an enemy creature.

items.name: Ebony Odogaron Mantle
entries: {@i Latent Power +1.} Когда вы впервые в бою снижаетесь до четверти от максимального количества хит-пойнтов или в начале вашего хода на 10-м раунде боя, в зависимости от того, что наступит раньше, вы получаете эффект заклинания {@spell haste} на 1 минуту. После использования вы должны завершить короткий или длинный отдых, прежде чем сможете использовать это свойство снова.

items.name: Nourishing Extract
entries: A material that replaces the {@item catalyst|AGMH} for crafting {@item demondrug|AGMH} or {@item armorskin|AGMH} potions. It can also be used in place of {@item mega nutrients|AGMH} when crafting {@item max potion|AGMH}s or {@item ancient potion|AGMH}s.

trait.name: Charge
entries: If the epioth moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a ram attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 2 ({@damage 1d4}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 10} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Water Breathing
entries: The epioth can breathe only underwater.

action.name: Ram
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d4}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6}) bludgeoning damage.

The Epioth is described as a marine version of the land dwelling {@creature Aptonoth|MHMM}, as both are very low in the food chain. They feed mainly on weeds, water grasses, and algae. They have specialized hides used for their aquatic home, making them perfectly adapted to an aquatic environment. Epioth have finned feet and a fin on their tail, which allows them to swim through water gracefully. When frightened, Epioth can swim at break neck speeds. Unlike the Aptonoth, Epioth live in small groups rather than large herds. The reason for this is that the water, whether in the sea or jungle river, has abundant hiding places. They are relatively docile when a adventurer is around, but they will defend themselves when a adventurer attacks. Occasionally, Epioth are known to sunbath on land.

items.name: Hydro Hide
entries: While wearing this armor, you have a swimming speed equal to your walking speed.

items.name: Raw Meat
entries: При приготовлении обеспечивает 2-дневный рацион.

items.name: Monster Guts
entries: Monster innards. A prized delicacy worth 50 gp.

items.name: Sm Monster Bone
entries: Необычный материал для модернизации оружия.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the fatalis fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The fatalis has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Shifting Scales
entries: The fatalis has three forms; black, crimson, and white. At the start of the fatalis turn its scales shift, black to crimson, crimson to white, or white to black. The Fatalis loses its breath weapon, damage immunities, and elemental damage from their bite or claw attacks and gain the benefits below of its new scale color. Breath attacks all share the same recharge.

items.name: Black Fire {@recharge 5}
entries: The fatalis exhales a black flame in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 24} Dexterity saving throw, taking 55 ({@damage 10d10}) necrotic damage plus 28 ({@dice 8d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

items.name: Bite
entries: attacks deal an additional 11 ({@damage 2d10}) necrotic damage (not included in the attack action).

items.name: Damage Immunities
entries: necrotic, bludgeoning.

items.name: Crimson Demons Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The fatalis exhales 90-foot line that is 10 feet wide. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 24} Dexterity saving throw, taking 54 ({@damage 12d8}) fire damage plus 28 ({@dice 8d6}) necrotic on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

items.name: Bite
entries: attacks deal an additional 11 ({@damage 2d10}) fire damage (not included in the attack action).

items.name: Damage Immunities
entries: fire, slashing.

items.name: Emperor's Roar {@recharge 5}
entries: The fatalis calls down a giant bolt of red lightning enveloping the area around the fatalis with a bright red glow. Each creature in a 20-foot-radius, 100-foot-high cylinder centered on the ground below the fatalis must make a {@dc 24} Dexterity saving throw, taking 56 ({@damage 16d6}) lighting damage plus 22 ({@dice 5d8}) fire on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

items.name: Claw
entries: attack deals an additional 7 ({@damage 2d6}) lightning damage (not included in the attack action).

items.name: Damage Immunities
entries: lightning, piercing.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The fatalis can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes three attacks. one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each creature of the fatalis's choice that is within 120 feet of the fatalis and aware of it must succeed on a {@dc 21} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the fatalis's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}25 ({@damage 3d10 + 9}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 3d6 + 9}) slashing damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} to hit, 20 ft., one target. {@h}27 ({@damage 4d8 + 9}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Fireball
entries: The fatalis exhales a fireball radius within 120 ft. of its location. Each creature in a 10-foot radius Sphere centered on that point must make a {@dc 24} Dexterity saving throw. A target takes 31 ({@damage 9d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.name: Detect
entries: The fatalis makes a Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check.

legendary.name: Tail Attack
entries: The fatalis makes a tail attack.

legendary.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The dragon beats its wings. Each creature within 15 feet of the fatalis must succeed on a {@dc 24} Dexterity saving throw or take 19 ({@damage 3d6 + 9}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}. The fatalis can then fly up to half its flying speed.

In legend, it is said that all living things fear Fatalis, including other Elder Dragons, such as {@creature Teostra|MHMM} and {@creature Lao-Shan Lung|MHMM}. All monsters are said to try to avoid Fatalis at all costs, leading to some leaving areas altogether simply to avoid it.

The Fatalis is a powerful, unnatural beast. The Fatalis's scales are extremely thick, while its shell is very durable.
